channel.title: Good Laptop?
channel.description:
Im not getting a MAC that's for sure. But I was thinking of getting a laptop for myself, and I know im poor(lol) but I can only afford 400 and below. If anyone can post advice or state how thier laptop is and if its fast or not. Please let me know.
I need a fast laptop, ( not by apple ) it needs good graphics,good for coding and gaming, and has a lot of room to download stuff. :)
-thanks

item.title: Good Laptop?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk

@B2300_T4nk wrote:

My Vaio is since 2006 with 1.5gb of RAM.

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Statik97:

I still can find one, I have till christmas though. Any more Ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2009, 11:48:23 am[/size][hr]Im thinking of toshiba or Vaio

I had an excellent toshiba it lasted me a year until it had an unfortune accident, mine was about 500 ish or so but it had 512mb of ram, etc.
